uiw.widget - MATLAB File Help
uiw.widget
Contents of uiw.widget package:

           CheckboxTree - A rich tree control with checkboxes for each node
       CheckboxTreeNode - Node for a checkbox tree control
     ColorOrderSelector - A color order selection control
          ColorSelector - A color selection control
          EditablePopup - A popup control with editable text
EditablePopupWithButton - A popup control with editable text and action button
           EditableText - A simple text or numeric edit field
EditableTextWithHistory - A popup control with editable text
           FileSelector - A file selection control with browse button
              FixedText - For Backward Compatibility Only
         FolderSelector - A folder selection control with browse button
          ImageSelector - A widget for selecting an image or media file
                   List - A simple listbox control
           ListSelector - A widget for adding/removing items from a list
        ListWithButtons - A listbox with ordering and action buttons
               Password - A password control that hides typed characters
                  Popup - A simple popup control
            ProgressBar - A progress and status indicator
                 Slider - A numeric slider with editable text value
                  Table - A rich table control
                   Text - A simple text display control
                Toolbar - A toolbar containing groups of push and toggle buttons
              Toolstrip - For Backward Compatibility Only
                   Tree - A rich tree control
               TreeNode - Node for a tree control
           testJsonSigs - is a live script
